title: URBANopt Switch
description: Schema for an URBANopt RNM Switch object

Code.description: Unique name/ID of the feature in the RNM analysis.

NodeA.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'From' Node it is associated with.

NodeB.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'To' Node it is associated with.

Subest.description: Substation the switch is connected to.

Feeder.description: Feeder the switch is connected to.
